name: LittleHomeofHorrors
description:
Imagine Toy Story, but horror

Collect all presents before the teddys kill you

Info for 32Bit GameJam:

We were not able to change the look of the game into 4:3 with low resolutions. The models and textures however are used with low geometry budget and resolution (64 x 64 or 124 x14 res). The game is quite unfinished, but we still wanted to submit our work. We also wanted to make a Web version, but we did not have the time.

Despite all this we enjoyed working on this!
